pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.11: Following this, the Pali reads (Dutiya) Pattavagga to indicate the last chapter of nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the nuns, and then Pariṇatasikkhāpada to indicate the last rule in the chapter of nissaggiya pācittiya rules. These indications are redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on nissaggiya pācittiya rules for the bhikkhus.
